title: DFL crashed when saving
body:
I was doing a deep fake with my 3080. I went to save it and it stopped and said sometimes about a memory error but it closed before I could copy it. Here are my settings.

=============== Model Summary ===============
==                                         ==
==            Model name: Matt_SAEHD       ==
==                                         ==
==     Current iteration: 23713            ==
==                                         ==
==------------- Model Options -------------==
==                                         ==
==            resolution: 128              ==
==             face_type: f                ==
==     models_opt_on_gpu: True             ==
==                 archi: liae-ud          ==
==               ae_dims: 128              ==
==                e_dims: 64               ==
==                d_dims: 64               ==
==           d_mask_dims: 22               ==
==       masked_training: True             ==
==       eyes_mouth_prio: True             ==
==           uniform_yaw: False            ==
==             adabelief: True             ==
==            lr_dropout: n                ==
==           random_warp: True             ==
==       true_face_power: 0.0              ==
==      face_style_power: 0.01             ==
==        bg_style_power: 0.0              ==
==               ct_mode: none             ==
==              clipgrad: False            ==
==              pretrain: False            ==
==       autobackup_hour: 1                ==
== write_preview_history: False            ==
==           target_iter: 0                ==
==           random_flip: True             ==

==             gan_power: 0.1              ==
==        gan_patch_size: 16               ==
==              gan_dims: 16               ==

==-------------- Running On ---------------==

=============================================
